notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (No. 81271692), the Ocean Antithrombotic Fibrinolytic Enzyme Gene Bank of Taiwan Strait (No. 2014FJPT08), the Science and Technology Innovation Public Technology Service Platform of Function of Drugs and Food (No. 3502Z20141015), Education Department of Fujian Province (JA14020) and Subsidized Project for Postgraduatesâ€™ Innovative Fund in Scientific Research of Huaqiao University (No. 17013071028).
